EmailTemplate.name: Cloud Foundry Foundation.Email Survey 8-12-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Survey - win an Apple watch!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Do you use Cloud Foundry? Take the Foundation survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CFUserSurvey2017]]> before 8/23 and win an Apple watch! This survey gives you an opportunity to influence engineering, while helping us understand key use cases and technology preferences. By sharing your opinions, the Cloud Foundry Foundation will be able to advocate on your behalf. Results will be shared with you in a report this fall.
Thanks, -Sent on behalf of the Cloud Foundry Foundation
